Title: APP commends INEC, security agencies over handling of Anambra poll
Summary: APP commends INEC, security agencies over handling of Anambra poll . APP, Imo State Chapter commended INEC and security agencies for their role in the just concluded governorship election .

Title: Faith, Power, and the Art of Diplomacy: Nigeria must respond to Trump’s threat with strategy, not emotion
Summary: Nigeria’s President Bola Tinubu has never worn religion as a badge and never been defined by religious identity . Though a Muslim, married a Christian Pastor, he has long been known for his ability to balance Nigeria's complex religious landscape .

Title: FG moves to improve utilisation, transparency in Basic Healthcare Provision Fund
Summary: Federal Government has commenced the onboarding of State Oversight Committees across the country to improve transparency, accountability, and efficiency in the implementation of the Basic Healthcare Provision Fund (BHCPF) 2.0 . The exercise began with the South-West Zonal meeting .

Title: Ex-convict stabs police officer in Ogun over alleged affair with wife
Summary: An ex-convict stabbed a police officer in the forehead in the early hours of last Friday . The incident occurred in the Panseke area of Abeokuta, the Ogun State capital, in Ogun state . The Guardian gathered that the former convict came after an affair with his wife .

Title: Tinubu hails Soludo’s re-election as triumph of visionary leadership
Summary: President Bola Tinubu hails Professor Chukwuma Soludo’s re-election as a triumph of visionary leadership . President described the victory as a resounding endorsement of his visionary leadership and transformative governance . Soludo's overwhelming win in Saturday's poll makes him the third Governor of the state .

Title: 2026 WC Playoff: Super Eagles camp open in Morocco as six players arrive
Summary: Nigeria national football team, the Super Eagles, are gradually arriving in Rabat, Morocco ahead of their crucial CAF World Cup playoff clash against Gabon on November 13 .

Title: NGF congratulates Gov Soludo on re-election
Summary: NGF congratulates Gov Soludo on re-election as Governor of Anambra State . Charles Chukwuma Soludo won the election at the weekend .

Title: FCT residents berate AEDC over epileptic power supply
Summary: FCT residents berate Abuja Electricity Distribution Company (AEDC) over epileptic power supply . Many residents of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT) berated the AEDC .

Title: Nottingham Forest down Leeds 3–1 for Dyche’s first EPL win
Summary: Nottingham Forest beat relegation rivals Leeds 3-1 to secure the first Premier League win of Sean Dyche's reign . Manchester City prepare for their crucial clash with Liverpool on Sunday .

Title: Morocco beat New Caledonia 16–0, set record for biggest win in U17 World Cup history
Summary: Morocco beat New Caledonia 16–0, set record for biggest win in U17 World Cup history . Morocco rounded off their group-stage campaign in sensational fashion .

ADC faults Anambra poll, says vote-buying threatens 2027 elections
